onPageAudit.title: Employee Engagement Survey Question Generator - Gem Tools
onPageAudit.metaDescription: Generate a list of effective employee engagement survey questions to measure satisfaction and identify areas for improvement.

marketingAudit.targetAudience: HR professionals, managers, team leads, organizational development specialists
marketingAudit.valueProposition: Create impactful employee engagement surveys to gather actionable insights and foster a positive workplace culture.

validationRules: Number of Questions must be a positive number
uxAudit.easeOfUse: High - clear inputs, relevant question generation
